# percent

**Type Property**

A style for formatting decimal values as a percent represntation.

## Declaration

```swift
static var percent: Decimal.FormatStyle.Percent { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this type property when the call point allows the use of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Decimal/FormatStyle]. You typically do this when calling the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Decimal/formatted(_:)] method of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Decimal].

## Applying percentage styles for decimals

- **Decimal.FormatStyle.Percent**: A format style that converts between decimal percentage values and their textual representations.
